Click-top closures
Imported



A Very Lucky History

We know that jeans are much more than just denim and grommets; they’re a true blue American icon.

Staying true to the rich heritage — and authentic, all-American spirit — of denim, Lucky Brand began crafting great-fitting, vintage-inspired jeans in Los Angeles in 1990. We gave them their distinctively Lucky look by literally putting them through the wringer — ripping, fraying, sanding, patching and washing by hand — to give them true character and soul. Then, we added authentic hardware, personalized touches and playful details, and an American legend was born.

Read more


Our jeans are made for the free-thinker, the artist, the dreamer; they’re made to dance, work, run, jump, play and rock ‘n’ roll (just like you). Our inspiration doesn’t just come from the rugged workwear of denim pioneers, but from the free spirit and laid-back lifestyle of our Southern California roots. We find inspiration everywhere, from the secluded outlooks of Big Sur, to the old-school tattoo parlors of Venice and the beautiful beaches of Malibu. We reference music, art and photography — old and new — to create truly unique pieces that you’ll wear over and over again.

Read more

About us

Lucky Brand was founded in 1990 with a spirit of reinvention. Rooted in premium denim, Americana and self expression, our brand is for the free– thinkers and the optimists who don’t take life too seriously. For those who say, “take-me-as-I-am. Or don’t. It’s cool.” In the beginning we experimented with vintage jeans, remixing the classic to create something new. Now we make denim AND lifestyle wares. Call it eclectic Americana for all. Our products portray personality through perfectly imperfect, often American-heritage inspired details that bring levity to any look, or situation. Lucky Brand brings The Luckening – that sweet thing that happens during a blah day that reminds you there’s always a lighter view. We know great fitting jeans won’t change your life, but maybe they can make you feel a little luckier.

Read more

Price: $29.00 - $24.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:39:21 UTC – Details)


Lucky Brand is true blue American. Born and bred in Los Angeles Lucky Brand is inspired by active Californian types like surfers, cowboys, bikers and sailors, as well as classic American iconography including vintage signs and posters. Several trademark signatures help further distinguish Lucky Brand jeans from the pack. Our heritage-inspired whiskey label, four leaf clover insignia and provocative “Lucky You” messages on the inside of the fly of our denim are unique touches that reflect our sense of heritage and our irreverent sense of humor.
Item Weight ‏ : ‎ 0.4 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ JLRY0839-Parent
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ August 6, 2014
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Lucky Brand Jewelry
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B00LH2FBIQ

Imported

Lucky Brand Jewelry

The right piece of jewelry can elevate your look from everyday to extraordinary. Shop women’s jewelry at Lucky Brand to find pieces that will do just that. Whether it’s rings, bracelets, anklets or earrings, these original pieces have an authentic style that will add an edge to your outfit. Discover incredibly modern designs with handcrafted details like hammered metals, fine beading, tassels and more. Lucky Brand’s timeless West Coast vibe perfectly translates into each design so every woman can enjoy self-assured quality and style. Look to Lucky for pieces that incorporate color and texture for a fantastic addition to your accessories’ collection.

Refresh Your Wardrobe with Jewelry For Women

Looking to add some fresh fun into your wardrobe? Do it with cute jewelry from Lucky Brand. Explore a California collection of pieces crafted with love to elevate your style. Long earrings with turquoise details are beautiful with an up-do for a festive feel that works day or night. Take jeans and a tee from boring to show-stopping by adding a statement medallion or coin necklace. Turn heads with rings boasting cool colorful stones and textured detail. Wear them stacked or alone for an effortlessly boho-chic vibe that works for the office, park, bar, or concert.

Jewelry Created With Love For You

Check out Lucky Brand for in-style jewelry that boasts both modern looks and impeccable craftsmanship. Luxurious materials such as silver, titanium and more are durable for everyday wear but elegant for a designer-quality look. Necklaces, rings, earrings and bracelets alike feature semi-precious stones such as pearls, turquoise, and jade. Powerful clasps and hooks keep each piece in place so you can wear without worry. Gorgeous, carefully crafted details like carvings, engravings, wraps, and even filigrees prove that each piece is made with love and attention. Discover a beautiful range of well-made and always stylish Lucky Brand pieces from bracelets and rings to chandelier earrings, charm necklaces and everything in between.

4.5
Price: $29.00 - $24.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:39:21 UTC – Details)

item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Make fast, easy and precise corrections on even the toughest errors with BIC Wite-Out Brand EZ Correct Correction Tape. This tear-resistant, film-based BIC Wite-Out Brand Correction Tape comes in a tape dispenser that offers maximum comfort and control, so you can easily and accurately correct mistakes. The tear resistance offers ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $7.99 - $5.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 04:55:04 UTC – Details)


Make fast, easy and precise corrections on even the toughest errors with BIC Wite-Out Brand EZ Correct Correction Tape. This tear-resistant, film-based BIC Wite-Out Brand Correction Tape comes in a tape dispenser that offers maximum comfort and control, so you can easily and accurately correct mistakes. The tear resistance offers tidy, inconspicuous corrections that last. The Wite-Out Brand tape requires no dry time and won’t bleed or drip, so you can instantly write or type your corrections over it. A translucent body lets you see exactly how much BIC correction tape remains and a self-winding wheel lets you easily rewind the correction tape should it become loose. One pack contains four tape dispensers, each containing 39.3 feet of white correction tape. If you’re looking for reliable office or school supplies for lefties and righties, look no further than this white correction tape. From America’s No. 1 correction brand*, choose BIC Wite-Out Brand EZ Correct Correction Tape for a high-quality, safe and affordable product you can trust. *Source: The NPD Group/Retail Tracking Service and Commercial Tracking Service, U.S., based on actual unit sales; 12ME June 2022 combined.
Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ No
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 5.25 x 8.13 x 0.75 inches; 3.1 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ WOTAPP418-WHI
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ June 27, 2017
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ BIC Corporation
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B0007L1W0E
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ Mexico

One 4-count pack of BIC Wite-Out Brand EZ Correct Correction Tape, a tear-resistant, film-based correction tape with a tape dispenser offering maximum comfort and control
Instantly write or type your corrections with this white correction tape, which requires no dry time and won’t bleed or drip
Clear correction tape dispenser lets you see exactly how much tape remains and the self-winding wheel lets you rewind the tape if it becomes loose
Each tape dispenser contains 39.3 feet of white correction tape to offer a long-lasting option for school or office supplies
Suitable for righties and lefties, these BIC Wite-Out Brand tapes offer a wide variety of use amongst students and employees for their documents and assignments

Read more

Strong Correction Tape from America’s #1 Correction Brand*

Instant, Tidy Corrections

BIC Wite-Out Brand correction tape applies dry, allowing you to quickly fix mistakes without the mess or waiting time of a correction fluid. Offering greater strength than paper-based tape, this film-based tape is more tear resistant to create tidy, inconspicuous corrections that last.

Easy to Apply

Dispensing the tape is easy: simply position the tip flat on the area to be corrected, press down firmly, and gently move from left to right. If tape becomes loose, press tip of tape firmly on paper, make slow motion towards the right, and repeat until tape rewinds.

Translucent Dispenser

The translucent dispenser allows you to see at a glance how much tape is remaining. You can apply the tape in a controlled, comfortable fashion.

Read more

Our Story

Our history begins in 1990, when we started crafting vintage-inspired jeans here in Los Angeles. Staying true to the rich heritage and all-American spirit of denim, we ripped, sanded, patched, and washed our jeans by hand to give them true character and soul. Then we added authentic hardware, personalized touches, and playful details, and a true blue American icon was born. As the original premium denim brand, Lucky Brand has always created the quality jeans , never sacrificing the classic fits, unique washes, and vintage details that set us apart . We continue to develop innovative fabrics and source from the finest factories and mills to create truly unique pieces you’ll keep coming back to.

Our jeans are made for the free thinkers, the thrill seekers, the go-getters, the daydreamers, those who have their own look and make their own luck. We find inspiration everywhere, from the laid-back lifestyle of our Southern California roots to contemporary pop culture and music.
